translation.en: He came back again last night and tore me like paper.
translation.es: Anoche volvió a venir y me rasgó como un papel.

translation.en: He opened me like a flower of pain...
translation.es: Me abrió como a una dolorosa flor...

translation.en: ...and it felt good.
He sank into me and set me on fire...
translation.es: Se hundió dentro de mí y me prendió fuego...

translation.en: ...like he always does.
Made me burn from the inside out.
translation.es: Me hizo arder desde las entrañas.

translation.en: How did you know it was the devil?
I know what you're thinking.
I know you think I'm talking about my stepfather...
translation.es: Sé que piensa que hablo de mi padrastro...

translation.en: ...because you don't believe in the devil.
translation.es: ...porque usted no cree en el diablo.

translation.en: Okay, let's talk about your stepfather.
translation.es: De acuerdo. Hablemos de tu padrastro.

translation.en: You know about my stepfather. You know I cut his throat.
translation.es: Ya sabe lo de mi padrastro. Sabe que le corté el cuello.

translation.en: I cut his Adam's apple in half...
translation.es: Le partí la nuez por la mitad...

translation.en: ...like a piece of fruit on a summer day...
translation.es: ...como se abre una fruta un día de verano...

translation.en: ...so he wouldn't say a word.
translation.es: ...para que no dijera ni una palabra.

translation.en: I sat next to him and watched him die...
translation.es: Me senté a su lado a verlo morir...

translation.en: ...slowly.
It was the only way to help him stop.
translation.es: Era la única manera de ayudarlo a parar.

translation.en: Stop what?
Stop fucking me!
You're not listening.
I am listening, Chloe.
You're not listening with your heart. Just your brain.
translation.es: ¡No me escucha con el corazón! Solo con el cerebro.

translation.en: Your brain is the problem.
You have no idea how it feels not to be trusted.
translation.es: No tiene ni idea de qué se siente cuando no confían en ti.

translation.en: You've got to trust me too, Chloe.
translation.es: Tú también debes confiar en mí.

translation.en: You can't trust someone who thinks you're crazy.
translation.es: No se puede confiar en alguien que cree que estás loca.

translation.en: Okay. I think that's enough for today.
But I do think we made some really good headway...
...found out some new things--
Do you know what it is to burn from the inside?
translation.es: ¿Sabe lo que es arder desde dentro?

translation.en: -Do you know? Because you are dead! -Let her go, Chloe.
translation.es: - ¡No lo sabe porque está muerta! - Suéltala, Chloe.

translation.en: I am. I'm not touching her! I'm not touching her! Let me go!
Let me go! Let me go.
You're driving me crazy! Stop!
-Stop it! -Let go!
"Open this door." Hey, you are dead!
Get in.
She's nuts.
Sorry.
I need to cross-reference some files with you on Monday. How's your morning?
translation.es: El lunes querría comparar mis informes con los tuyos.

translation.en: -Check with Anna. She'll fit you in. -Thanks. Sorry.
translation.es: - Habla con Anna. Te hará un hueco. - Lo siento.

translation.en: I'm not discharging her, period.
If you want to pursue this, sir, have a judge order her transfer.
translation.es: Si quiere conseguirlo, que un juez ordene su traslado.

translation.en: Until then she's mine.
Thank you.
Lawyers.
Hey, come on in.
What's up?
Chloe. She's embellishing her rape story again.
translation.es: Chloe. Vuelve a recrearse en su violación.

translation.en: She says that the devil is visiting her in her cell.
translation.es: Dice que el diablo la visita en su celda.

translation.en: -Okay. -It's the third time in three months.
translation.es: Es la tercera vez en tres meses.

translation.en: It has something to do with her stepfather, possibly remorse...
translation.es: Creo que es por su padrastro, quizá sea remordimiento...

translation.en: ...but instead of assessing the memory and accepting it...
translation.es: ...y en vez de asimilarlo y aceptarlo...

translation.en: ...she just falls into these satanic meanderings.
Time. Give it time.
I've given it time. Time and Elavil. And Mellaril and Haldol.
translation.es: Ya le he dado tiempo. Y Elavil. Y Mellaril. Y Haldol.

translation.en: Maybe they're just...
...too medicated.
I know we all create our realities to some extent. Yes, true.
translation.es: Sé que todos creamos nuestras propias realidades.

translation.en: But what she creates is so far from any objective reality....
translation.es: Pero lo de ella se aleja tanto de cualquier realidad objetiva...

translation.en: Chloe's mind only runs on one track.
translation.es: Su mente funciona en un solo sentido.

translation.en: Well, right now, my mind is running on empty.
translation.es: Pues ahora mismo, la mía está en blanco.

translation.en: Come here.
You have a brilliant mind.
You'll figure it out.
Throw it on the mirror.
This is what she sees now.
translation.es: Esto es lo que ella ve ahora.

translation.en: -A distorted image of herself. -Who are you in all this?
translation.es: - Se ve distorsionada. - ¿Y tú qué papel juegas?

translation.en: -I'm the mirror. -You are the mirror.
translation.es: - Soy el espejo. - Eres el espejo.

translation.en: If I'm the mirror and she's the image...
translation.es: Si yo soy el espejo y ella es la imagen...

translation.en: ...then who are you?
I can see both of you...
translation.es: Yo puedo veros a las dos...

translation.en: ...so I'm God.
Or just an overworked hospital bureaucrat.
translation.es: O solo un burócrata sobrecargado de trabajo.

translation.en: "God" is good.
Always remember, the ability to repress...
translation.es: Recuérdalo siempre: la capacidad de reprimir recuerdos...

translation.en: ...is actually a vital survival tool. Without it...
translation.es: ...es en realidad una herramienta de supervivencia vital. Sin ella...

translation.en: ...Chloe might not have survived.
Sorry, am I interrupting the happy couple?
Dr. Graham. We were just discussing repression as a survival mechanism.
translation.es: Doctor Graham. Estábamos discutiendo la represión de recuerdos como supervivencia.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, I had a date last week.
I barely survived it. I'm trying to forget it.
I'm sure your amorous adventures are fascinating, doctor...
translation.es: Seguro que sus aventuras amorosas son fascinantes.

translation.en: ...but sadly, I'm on my way out.
translation.es: Pero, por desgracia, ya me iba.

translation.en: -Well, don't let me-- I'll just-- -No, no, no, I'm leaving.
I'm gonna run out to Willow Creek. Meet the new contractor.
translation.es: Debo ir a Willow Creek a ver al nuevo contratista.

translation.en: I'll be here. See you at dinner.
translation.es: Yo me quedo. Te veré para la cena.

translation.en: Keep an eye on my wife for me, Pete. I know you will. Here.
translation.es: Cuide de mi mujer, Pete. Sé que lo hará. Tenga.

translation.en: -No, thanks. -No, let me circumcise it for you.
Smoke it tonight while it's fresh.
translation.es: Fúmeselo esta noche, que está fresco.

translation.en: -Good night, boss. -Good night, kids.
Why don't we share one of those golden-crust, cheese-filled specials.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no pedimos una pizza crujiente de queso?

translation.en: -It sounds like a great offer... -Here's the file.
translation.es: - Es una oferta tentadora, pero... - Tu archivo.

translation.en: -...but I got work to do. -I'm buying.
-It's cold when it gets here. -We could warm it up.
translation.es: Invito yo. - Llegará fría. - La calentaremos.

translation.en: -I hate pizza. -Who doesn't like pizza?
translation.es: - Odio la pizza. - ¿A quién no le gusta?

translation.en: Come on, you gotta eat.
Not with you.
Come on, we're supposed to celebrate. I just got circumcised....
translation.es: Tenemos que celebrar que me acaban de circuncidar.

translation.en: -Who's inside? -We have Shelley for observation.
translation.es: - ¿Quién hay dentro? - Tenemos a Shelley vigilándola.

translation.en: -Why? What happened? -She had another attack.
translation.es: - ¿Qué ha pasado? - Ha tenido otro ataque.

translation.en: -What'd you do, up her meds? -Yeah, 25 milligrams.
translation.es: - ¿Le habéis aumentado la dosis? - Veinticinco miligramos.

translation.en: That's extreme. That dose is way too high.
translation.es: Es excesivo. Una dosis demasiado alta.

translation.en: I want a copy of that on my desk by Monday, okay?
translation.es: Quiero una copia el lunes por la mañana.

translation.en: -Okay. -Thank you.
Damn generator.
Not again.
Irene, is that you?
This electric system's gonna give us trouble.
Fourth time this week. I'm going for my swim.
translation.es: Es la cuarta vez esta semana. Me voy a nadar.

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna do my job, as long as these damn lights stay on.
translation.es: Yo seguiré con mi trabajo, si la luz aguanta.

translation.en: -Good night, Joe. -Hey, how many laps, doc?
Fifty-five, but who's counting?
translation.es: Cincuenta y cinco. ¿Pero quién lleva la cuenta?

translation.en: Oh, you've outdone yourself. Hey, safe drive home.
translation.es: Se ha superado a sí misma. Conduzca con cuidado.

translation.en: Thank you. Say hi to your wife for me. Will do.
All that education but you can't remember an umbrella.
-Did you get my note? -I got your note. Your business note.
translation.es: - ¿Te llegó mi nota? - Sí, me llegó. Tu nota de trabajo.

translation.en: Right. So how was your date with...?
With what's-her-name? It was like all of my dates. It was brief. It was pointless.
translation.es: ¿Con cómo-se-llame? Pues como todas mis citas. Breve. E inútil.

translation.en: She didn't respond to my sense of humor, my boyish good looks...
translation.es: No respondió a mi genial humor ni a mi atractivo...

translation.en: ...so I started talking about work.
She said that was not a suitable topic for a first date...
translation.es: No le pareció el mejor tema para una primera cita.

translation.en: ...and that was it. I mean, it was just drinks, you know.
translation.es: Y se acabó. Todo quedó en unas copas.

translation.en: I mean, we didn't even have dinner.
She's not right. When you know, you know.
translation.es: No me convenía. Esas cosas se saben.

translation.en: I know.
-I'll follow you down the hill. -You don't have to.
translation.es: - Te sigo hasta el cruce. - No hace falta.

translation.en: -I'm supposed to keep an eye on you. -Since when did you listen to the boss?
translation.es: - El jefe me mandó cuidarte. - ¿Desde cuándo haces caso al jefe?

translation.en: Severe showers all over northern Connecticut and New Hampshire.
translation.es: Fuertes chubascos en Connecticut y Nuevo Hampshire.

translation.en: -I know, I see that. --rain in Lennox County....
-I can't let you through. Road's closed. -What's going on?
-I got this. -There's a sinkhole.
Hi, Bob. You picked a hell of a night for a drive.
translation.es: - Hola, Bob. - Menuda noche para conducir.

translation.en: There's a sinkhole up here, you can't get through. Sorry.
translation.es: No puedes pasar. ¿Y entonces qué hago?

translation.en: -What should I do? -Go a quarter of a mile, take a left--
translation.es: ¿Y entonces qué hago? Retrocede 500 metros y a la izquierda.

translation.en: You know that bridge that Doug and I fish at?
translation.es: ¿Conoces el puente donde pescamos Doug y yo?

translation.en: -Yeah, the little white one? -That's the one.
-Yeah. -You can go across there.
translation.es: - ¿Ese blanco pequeño? - Exacto. Puedes ir por allí.

translation.en: -Okay, thanks. -Hey, tell Doug to give me a call.
translation.es: Puedes ir por allí. Dile a Doug que me llame.

translation.en: Will do.
-Doug, you're home? -Yeah, where are you?
I got detoured, so I'll be home in a few minutes, okay? How was Willow Creek?
translation.es: Me han desviado. Tardaré un poco más. ¿Y Willow Creek?

translation.en: This rain is slowing the work down. It's a big mess.
-Are you okay? -Yeah.
Are you okay?
Are you okay?
Oh, my God. Okay. Okay. Okay.
I'm a doctor. I'm gonna take you to the hospital. I'm a doctor, honey.
translation.es: Soy médico. Voy a llevarte al hospital. Soy médico.

translation.en: I'm gonna help you, okay? You're gonna be okay.
translation.es: Te voy a ayudar. Te pondrás bien.

translation.en: I'm gonna help you, okay?
Help me!
Somebody!
Dr. Graham!
You better tell me why I'm in here, Irene. She got up wild.
translation.es: - ¡Más vale que me digas qué hago aquí! - Está hecha una fiera.

translation.en: -Bring your ass back in here. -Give me 40 milligrams of Ativan.
translation.es: ¡Vuelve aquí ahora mismo! ¡Que no se me acerque! ¡No me toques!

translation.en: -Get your hands off me. -Stay in the cell.
translation.es: ¡Que no se me acerque! ¡No me toques! - ¡Que no se acerque a mí! - Sujétala.

translation.en: -Keep her off. -Restrain her.
Keep her off of me. Get off of me. Do you hear me? Get off of me.
Hold on. Calm--
What are you doing? What are you doing to me?
Thank you, nurse.
-Are you okay? -Yeah, she calmed down. This is so sad.
Miranda, this is very awkward.
I suppose that technically I shouldn't even be treating you...
translation.es: En teoría, yo no debería tratarte, pero...

translation.en: ...but I managed to get the court to grant us a waiver... ...until you're transferred.
translation.es: ...el tribunal nos ha autorizado hasta que te trasladen.

translation.en: Anything we discuss is in strict confidence...
translation.es: Lo que hablemos aquí es confidencial.

translation.en: ...and won't go anywhere but this room.
translation.es: Lo que hablemos aquí es confidencial. No saldrá de esta habitación.

translation.en: How long have I been in here?
Three days.
Why? Why?
You were admitted to our neurosurgical unit... ...you were seizing violently.
translation.es: Te ingresaron en Neurocirugía. Sufrías violentos ataques.

translation.en: We did scans and they revealed left-sided weakness, numbness...
translation.es: Los escáneres revelaron debilidad del lado izquierdo...

translation.en: ...severe frontal-lobe deficits.
You received Haloperidol, Ativan injections.
When you came out of it, we tested. You were negative for PCP.
translation.es: Diste negativo en PCP, así que no sabíamos...

translation.en: You were put in restraints for a day and a half... ...so you wouldn't injure yourself.
translation.es: Pero te pusimos correas durante un día y medio para evitar lesiones.

translation.en: And then you basically went into a state of catatonia.
translation.es: Y luego entraste en un estado de catatonia.

translation.en: This is the first time I've seen you lucid.
translation.es: Es la primera vez que estás lúcida.

translation.en: I wanna talk to my husband.
Where is he? Where is he?
You know, you're the most logical person I know, bar none.
translation.es: Eres la persona más lógica que conozco.

translation.en: You rely only on the facts.
translation.es: Solo te basas en los hechos.

translation.en: So why am I telling you this?
You're establishing my personality.
You think I'm a rational person. You don't think I'm impulsive or emotional.
translation.es: Me consideras racional. No crees que sea impulsiva ni emotiva.

translation.en: And following this pattern of analysis, we are about to discuss...
translation.es: Y en esta línea de análisis... ...discutamos un suceso traumático que contradice todo este perfil.

translation.en: ...a traumatic event which has rendered...
translation.es: ...discutamos un suceso traumático que contradice todo este perfil.

translation.en: ...this psychological profile useless.
translation.es: ...discutamos un suceso traumático que contradice todo este perfil. Crees que es un estado de negación.

translation.en: -You think I'm in denial. -Don't analyze yourself...
translation.es: Crees que es un estado de negación. No te analices... ...concéntrate en recordar.

translation.en: ...just focus on remembering.
Miranda...
...what's the last thing you remember?
I remember Chloe.
I was having my Friday night session with Chloe.
translation.es: Tenía mi sesión del viernes con ella.

translation.en: How did that go?
She was embellishing her rape story.
translation.es: Se estaba recreando en su violación.

translation.en: -I saw Doug. -Dr. Graham.
You were there.
When I went back to my office, I worked on Chloe's file.
translation.es: Volví a mi despacho y trabajé en el historial de Chloe.

translation.en: I decided to call it quits, I went down to the pool, had a swim, 55 laps...
translation.es: Decidí dejarlo, me fui a la piscina, hice 55 largos.

translation.en: ...saw Joe, got my keys. Went to my car. You walked me to it.
translation.es: Vi a Joe, cogí las llaves, fui al coche... Tú me acompañaste.

translation.en: -Yes. -But--
-There was a detour. -Oh, hey, tell Doug....
I had to go over the bridge, so I went over the bridge.
translation.es: Tenía que ir por el puente, y eso hice.

translation.en: I wonder what else happened. Try to remember.
translation.es: Cuéntame qué más pasó. Intenta recordar.

translation.en: I got home.
I saw Doug. He was on the couch.
translation.es: Vi a Doug. Estaba en el sofá.

translation.en: Try to remember.
There was a girl.
-Yeah, there was a girl. -No, there was no--
translation.es: - Sí, había una chica. - No, no había...

translation.en: Yeah, there was a girl.
-A girl at the bridge. -There was no report--
-There was some kind of accident. -No.
-The girl was bloody. On the bridge.... -I want to ask you about Doug.
translation.es: Estaba llena de sangre en el puente. La cara.

translation.en: What's the last thing you remember?
Why are you asking about Doug? I'm telling you about a girl I saw.
translation.es: ¿Por qué preguntas por él? Vi a una chica.

translation.en: Was there any trouble in your marriage?
No, there was no trouble in my marriage.
And why are you using the past tense of the word?
...you don't remember anything about Doug? Anything at all?
translation.es: ¿No recuerdas nada acerca de Doug? ¿Nada en absoluto?

translation.en: Don't tell me something's wrong with Doug.
I have to tell you something. Something very difficult.
translation.es: Tengo que decirte algo. Me resulta muy difícil.

translation.en: -Don't tell me something's with Doug. -Miranda...
...Doug is dead.
You killed him.
I didn't.
I'm on your side.
I'm on your side.
It's Dr. Grey.
Look it up. Don't look at me like that.
I'm the official champion again.
Hello, Miranda. Welcome.
You're one of us now.
You know I don't belong here, Chloe.
translation.es: Sabes que no merezco estar aquí.

translation.en: If you're here, it must mean that you belong.
translation.es: Si estás aquí, será porque lo mereces.

translation.en: You are not a doctor in here.
translation.es: Aquí dentro no eres una doctora.

translation.en: And even if you tell the truth...
...no one will listen.
You know why? Because you're crazy.
And the more you try to prove them wrong...
translation.es: Y cuanto más trates de demostrar que no...

translation.en: ...the crazier you appear.
You are invisible now.
Can you feel it?
Don't touch me.
Are you scared?
You should be.
I'm dreaming.
I'm dreaming.
Dream logic, primary process, that's what this is.
translation.es: Sueño, proceso primario. Esto es lo que pasa.

translation.en: I'm dreaming. I'm dreaming. I'm dreaming. I'm dreaming.
I'm not crazy. I'm dreaming.
Rise and shine, honey. It's a new day.
translation.es: Arriba y espabila, cielo. Es un nuevo día.

translation.en: I wanna talk to Pete.
You'll see Dr. Graham all in good time... ...but I want you to have some breakfast.
translation.es: Verás al doctor Graham a su debido tiempo. Ahora el desayuno.

translation.en: -Why are you doing this to me, Irene? -I'm just doing my job.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué me haces esto? - Yo solo hago mi trabajo.

translation.en: You don't want me to get Jim to help me, now do you?
translation.es: No querrás que le pida ayuda a Jim, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Good girl. You're doing good.
Come on, sweetheart, now it's time for a shower.
translation.es: Vamos, cariño, es hora de ducharse.

translation.en: Come on, honey, time to wash away your sins.
translation.es: Venga, guapa. Es hora de lavar tus pecados.

translation.en: You're a nut.
Yeah, it's you. You.
What's your problem?
What's your problem?
I looked away for a second. It's unacceptable.
translation.es: Aparté la vista un segundo. Es inadmisible.

translation.en: It's not your fault.
Patients always find a way to hurt themselves, if that's what they want.
translation.es: Siempre buscan el modo de autolesionarse, si es lo que quieren.

translation.en: I never pegged her for a cutter, that's all.
translation.es: Nunca pensé que fuera de las que se cortan.

translation.en: Neither did I.
Shelley says Chloe's been threatening Miranda...
...so I put her in isolation for the day.
translation.es: ...así que la he puesto en aislamiento.

translation.en: How is she?
She's a mess.
I can't believe she's lost it so quickly. I've never seen that before.
translation.es: Ha enloquecido muy deprisa. Nunca había visto algo así.

translation.en: She cut herself 35 times, a lot of blood, but it's superficial.
translation.es: Treinta y cinco cortes superficiales, ha perdido mucha sangre.

translation.en: -What was the implement? -Probably a scalpel...
...though how anybody got it in there, I have no idea.
translation.es: Aunque no sé cómo llegó hasta allí.

translation.en: Hey, Tony. We're fine.
You think I did this to myself, don't you?
translation.es: Crees que me lo he hecho yo, ¿no?

translation.en: Did you?
Well, I don't know.
Who would it be, then? Would it be...
...Chloe, or...?
I don't know.
By your own admission you have difficulty...
...distinguishing what's reality from fantasy, so is it possible?
translation.es: Has reconocido que te cuesta... ...distinguir realidad de fantasía, así que, ¿es posible?

translation.en: Yeah, as a doctor, I understand why you think that.
translation.es: Sí, como médico, comprendo que pienses eso.

translation.en: But something is really happening to me.
translation.es: Pero realmente me está pasando algo.

translation.en: What about this moment, right now?
translation.es: ¿Qué hay de este momento, de ahora?

translation.en: What about it?
Is this a hallucination?
Is it?
I suggest that we simply increase the medication...
translation.es: Sugiero que simplemente te aumentemos la medicación...

translation.en: ...until things make sense.
Or maybe until I can get myself a new doctor.
translation.es: O quizá hasta que pueda conseguir otro médico.

translation.en: Pardon?
Since I'm hallucinating and I can't seem to remember things...
translation.es: Ya que sufro alucinaciones y no recuerdo las cosas...

translation.en: ...you can help me with something.
Yeah. Inhale.
Did we have an affair?
Did you want to?
Yes.
Did you think I wanted to?
Yes.
Then why didn't we?
Because you were married to the boss.
translation.es: Porque estabas casada con el jefe.

translation.en: But I'm not now.
I'm here-- I'm....
I'm trying to help you.
Why don't you trust me?
Because you can't trust somebody when they think you're crazy.
translation.es: No se puede confiar en alguien que cree que estás loca.

translation.en: Phil.
Hello, Miranda.
I need to talk to you for a minute.
This is about Pete.
What about him, Miranda?
I don't think he's the best doctor to be treating me.
translation.es: No es el más indicado para tratarme.

translation.en: Is your complaint about him on a personal level?
Pete's the best doctor I have on my staff now.
translation.es: Ahora Pete es el mejor médico de mi equipo...

translation.en: And he has my full support.
Now, if you'll excuse me, Miranda.
-Miranda. -Hi, Teddy.
-How are they treating you? -Like I'm crazy, Teddy.
translation.es: - ¿Qué tal? ¿Cómo te tratan? - Como a una loca.

translation.en: -They think I did it, but I didn't do it. -All right. Thank you.
translation.es: Creen que lo hice yo. Pero no es así. Vale, gracias.

translation.en: -I didn't do it, Teddy. -Have a seat.
translation.es: Yo no lo hice, Teddy. Ven, vamos a sentarnos.

translation.en: Let's not talk about what you did or didn't do, all right?
translation.es: No hablemos de lo que hiciste o dejaste de hacer.

translation.en: What's important is what I can do for you now.
translation.es: Lo importante es qué puedo hacer por ti.

translation.en: Now, the DA is pushing for a hearing as early as next week.
translation.es: El fiscal del distrito quiere que tengamos una vista oral... ...la semana que viene.

translation.en: Next week? We haven't even had time to investigate.
translation.es: ¿La semana que viene? Ni siquiera ha habido tiempo para investigar.

translation.en: We can't have a hearing next week.
As your attorney, I gotta tell you the evidence is overwhelming.
translation.es: Escucha, como tu abogado... ...te advierto de que hay pruebas aplastantes.

translation.en: You've been placed at the scene. The sheriff saw you driving home.
translation.es: Te sitúan en la escena. El sheriff te vio ir hacia casa.

translation.en: The neighbors heard the screams.
They've got the murder weapon with your prints on it.
translation.es: Tienen el arma. Tus huellas están en el arma.

translation.en: Your prints are on the floor, walls, everything.
translation.es: En el suelo, las paredes, en todo.

translation.en: Yeah, but what's my motive? I don't have a motive, Teddy.
translation.es: Ya, pero, ¿qué móvil tenía? No tenía ninguno.

translation.en: Why would I do that? Maybe one of his ex-patients came.
translation.es: ¿Por qué iba a hacerlo? Puede que fuera una de sus ex pacientes.

translation.en: Has anybody checked the files? Has anybody escaped?
That person would have a motive. I was there, and I would scream.
translation.es: Tendría un móvil. Yo estaba, debí gritar.

translation.en: -Maybe I went into shock. -Miranda.
translation.es: Quizá entré en estado de shock.

translation.en: The only shot we have is to plead temporary insanity.
I don't even know if that's gonna work. You're a brilliant psychiatrist.
translation.es: Y ni siquiera sé si dará resultado. Al ser psiquiatra...

translation.en: That will make jurors think "If she wanted to kill somebody...
translation.es: ...el jurado pensará: Si quería matar a alguien...

translation.en: ...she could probably fake insanity and get away with it."
I'm not crazy.
-That's the point. -No, the point is...
translation.es: - Esa es la cuestión. - ¡La cuestión es...

translation.en: ...I'm the only one around here that believes I didn't kill my husband!
translation.es: ...que solo yo creo que no maté a mi marido!

translation.en: Do you think I'm crazy?
That's all right. Forget it.
Forget it.
Sheriff Ryan is here.
He'd like to talk to you.
You know he was Doug's best friend, so I'd advise against it.
translation.es: Sabes que era su mejor amigo, yo lo desaconsejaría.

translation.en: It's fine, Teddy. I don't have anything to hide.
translation.es: No importa. No tengo nada que esconder.

translation.en: Five minutes.
Hi, Bob.
I just have a few questions that we need to clear up.
translation.es: Tengo algunas preguntas que necesitamos aclarar.

translation.en: When you first came in and he was sitting on the couch...
translation.es: Cuando entraste en casa y él estaba en el sofá...

translation.en: ...the way we reconstruct the crime...
...is the first blow came from in front of him.
translation.es: ...el primer golpe lo recibió de frente...

translation.en: Which means he must have seen it coming.
And what we don't understand is how he....
translation.es: Lo que no comprendemos es cómo él...

translation.en: -Why did you do it? -Sheriff.
How could you kill Doug like that? He loved you.
-That's the question I need answered. -You don't have to answer.
translation.es: - Solo contesta a esa pregunta. - No tienes por qué contestar.

translation.en: I don't have any answers to the questions, Bob.
translation.es: No tengo respuesta a tus preguntas.

translation.en: You don't? You better start thinking...
...of some answers, because you're in some trouble.
translation.es: ¿No la tienes? ¡Pues piensa en alguna... ...porque estás en un lío!

translation.en: -Sheriff, that's enough. That's enough! -No, no, no.
I need her to tell me why she did it.
translation.es: Que me diga por qué lo hizo.

translation.en: Okay, we're done. Enough!
Let's kill your friend, see how you feel!
translation.es: ¿Qué haría si matasen a su amigo?

translation.en: -You said no shock treatment. -Here's some shock treatment!
translation.es: - Dijo no traumático. - ¿Quiere ver algo traumático?

translation.en: Stop it. Why would you take these out? Don't look.
Don't look at them.
I had to pick him up off the floor, Miranda. In pieces!
translation.es: ¡Tuve que recogerlo del suelo a pedazos!

translation.en: Miranda, what's that?
It's okay. It's okay, Miranda.
translation.es: Tranquila. - Tranquila, Miranda. - ¿Por qué me hacéis esto?

translation.en: -Why are you doing this to me? -Miranda, let's just go. We're done.
translation.es: - Tranquila, Miranda. - ¿Por qué me hacéis esto? - Miranda, vamos. - ¿Por qué?

translation.en: -Why are you doing this to me? -It's okay.
translation.es: - Hemos terminado. - ¿Por qué me hacéis esto?

translation.en: -Why are you doing this to me? -It's okay.
translation.es: - Tranquila, Miranda. - ¿Por qué me lo hacéis?

translation.en: Why are you doing this to me? Why are you doing this to me?!
translation.es: ¿Por qué me hacéis esto? ¿Por qué me lo hacéis?

translation.en: Come in, Miranda.
Please, take a seat.
You wanted to see me.
I was there.
I was there when Doug was killed.
translation.es: Estaba allí cuando mataron a Doug.

translation.en: But I wasn't alone.
I wasn't there alone, and that's what "not alone" means.
translation.es: No estaba allí sola, y eso significa no sola.

translation.en: -Who was there with you? -I don't know who it was.
I don't know. I don't know who it was.
translation.es: No lo sé. No sé quién era.

translation.en: But somebody else was there.
We know you have no family left.
translation.es: Sabemos que no te queda familia.

translation.en: We are your family now.
I know. I know you.... I know.
I want you to know that we're gonna do everything we possibly can...
translation.es: Y quiero que sepas que vamos a hacer todo lo posible...

translation.en: ...to help you and to make you feel secure.
translation.es: ...para ayudarte, hacer que te sientas segura...

translation.en: And to make you feel that you can trust us here.
translation.es: ...y lograr que sientas que puedes confiar en nosotros.

translation.en: But there's a hearing scheduled.
translation.es: Pero va a haber una vista oral.

translation.en: -Miranda. Sit down. -Just-- Come on, sit down.
Who is this girl?
-Put the picture back. -Who is this girl?
That's my daughter, Rachel.
No, this is the girl I saw at the bridge. This is the girl.
translation.es: Es la niña que vi en el puente. Esta es la chica.

translation.en: -No. -How is she? Where is she?
-It's impossible. -This is the girl I've been seeing.
translation.es: - Es imposible. - Es la chica que he estado viendo.

translation.en: This girl, right here.
She's dead.
Rachel died four years ago.
I'm a rational person.
I believe in science.
I don't believe in the paranormal.
And I don't believe in ghosts.
translation.es: Y tampoco creo en los fantasmas.

translation.en: But if you are the ghost of Rachel Parsons...
translation.es: Pero si eres el fantasma de Rachel Parsons...

translation.en: ...then you would let me out of this cell.
Shit. Pete's office.
Chloe.
Help me!
Let me go! Let me go!
Check Chloe! Check Chloe! She needs help!
-Did you talk to Chloe? -Yes.
-Was she raped? -Was she raped? No.
translation.es: - ¿La han violado? - ¿Si la han violado? No.

translation.en: -Why? -Did you check her?
Did I--? She was checked. Of course she was checked.
-He didn't have time. -He?
-What about her face? She had a cut. -Ran into a wall.
translation.es: - Su cara. Un corte. - Chocó contra una pared.

translation.en: She did that to herself.
I saw a tattoo. Did she talk about a tattoo?
translation.es: Vi un tatuaje. ¿Ha hablado de un tatuaje?

translation.en: -Why don't you sit down. A tattoo? -Yeah, a tattoo.
A woman in flames, hands up like this:
translation.es: De una mujer, en llamas, las manos en alto, así.

translation.en: Like a Biblical image.
The Anima Sola?
-The Anima Sola. That's what I saw. -It's a common archetypal image.
translation.es: - Sí, el Ánima Sola. - Es lo que has descrito. Eso fue lo que vi. Es una imagen arquetípica.

translation.en: I mean, it's the woman in chains, awaiting her fate.
translation.es: Es la mujer encadenada que espera su destino.

translation.en: I'm talking about something I saw on the chest of a man.
translation.es: Hablo de algo que vi en el pecho de un hombre.

translation.en: -That's what I saw. -You're in crisis.
translation.es: - Fue lo que vi. - Estás en crisis.

translation.en: This image is tailor-made for your state of mind.
translation.es: Esa imagen refleja tu estado de ánimo.

translation.en: A woman in purgatory.
I need you to explain this to me, though.
-Rachel did not commit suicide. -She jumped off a bridge.
translation.es: - Rachel Parsons no se suicidó. - Saltó desde un puente.

translation.en: -When I saw her-- -She was washed downstream 5 miles.
translation.es: - La habían golpeado. - La arrastró la corriente.

translation.en: -She was cut up. -You saw her?
translation.es: - Tenía cortes. Sufría un shock. - ¿La viste?

translation.en: -I saw her. Someone did that to her! -Police, newspapers, coroner wrong?
translation.es: - Sí. ¡Alguien lo hizo! - Los Parsons, la poli, la prensa...

translation.en: -Let's reopen the case. -Maybe they should!
-I saw her. And she's connected to me. -Delusions, hallucinations...
translation.es: - Solo sé que yo la vi... - Desvarío... - ...y está conectada a mí. - ...alucinaciones...

translation.en: -How, I don't know. -...disorganized speech, incoherence--
translation.es: - No sé cómo, pero lo está. - ...incoherencia...

translation.en: Don't rattle off your psychiatric shit! I know it like the back of my hand!
translation.es: ¡Ahórrate tu rollo psiquiátrico! Lo conozco de sobra. ¡Bien!

translation.en: Good.
Saves me the trouble.
Glass cells are having electrical problems.
I'm gonna transfer you to a Psych Ward cell.
One strike, you're going to solitary.
translation.es: Una falta y vas a aislamiento.

translation.en: Don't screw up.
Rachel Parsons was there.
Dead or alive, I don't know.
translation.es: Viva o muerta. No lo sé.

translation.en: That girl came to me.
translation.es: Pero esa chica acudió a mí.

translation.en: She came to me.
Hi, Chloe.
I'm sorry.
I'm sorry.
I'm sorry I didn't believe you.
I need you to tell me who did this to you.
translation.es: Necesito que me digas quién te hizo esto.

translation.en: Tell me his name, Chloe.
Chloe, tell me. Tell me anything. Tell me.
I'll tell you one thing:
He can have my body...
...but he will never have my soul.
Never.
The devil.
It's okay.
It's okay.
He said you're next.
translation.es: Dijo que tú eras la próxima.

translation.en: -Try to stay awake. -Yes, ma'am.
If you need me, I'll be in the coffee room.
translation.es: Si me necesitas, estaré en la sala del café.

translation.en: Lights out.
Leave me alone!
-Doesn't even look like a real ant. -It's got disco balls for eyes.
translation.es: - No parece de verdad. - Los ojos, bolas de espejos.

translation.en: -'50s B movies, man. -Giant bug movies are great.
translation.es: - Pelis de serie B de los 50. - Geniales.

translation.en: Hey, what is that?
It's Dr. Grey. She's trying to kill herself.
Level C, we've got suicidal behavior in cell 33. Sending backup.
translation.es: Nivel C, suicida en celda 33. Enviamos refuerzos.

translation.en: Open it!
Dr. Grey's in trouble!
Number 33, open it now!
Oh, damn. Damn, what a mess.
-Hold her, I'll medicate her. -What the hell for? She's already out.
translation.es: - Sujétela. La medicaré. - ¿Para qué? Está inconsciente.

translation.en: Don't argue with me.
Jesus! Easy, easy. No, don't hurt me.
Stop her! She's got my keys, stop her!
We got a runner! Inmate escaping! Block Three!
-Stay with me. -All right.
She's gone this way. Let's go!
Split up! Keep moving!
Shit!
Shit!
Hold it right there!
Dr. Grey! We're on Three, she's heading for One!
Come on, Hank.
Don't think she made it to this building anyway.
Yeah, but even so, there's no way she can get out.
Let's go. I don't think she's in here.
translation.es: Vámonos. No creo que esté aquí.

translation.en: We checked corridors Four and Five.
translation.es: Hemos comprobado los pasillos cuatro y cinco.

translation.en: -We're headed to Six and Seven. -Yeah. It's Joe, up at the desk.
-What's going on down there? -Looks dark down there.
What do you mean, what do I mean?
Look, this is the fourth time this month... ...this has happened. Never mind.
translation.es: Este mes es la cuarta vez. Olvídelo.

translation.en: -Ye-- Thank you. -Finally.
-Took long enough. -Shit.
Hey, Joe.
You see something?
Yeah, just now when the monitors came on.
Corridor Six, something flashed in front of the camera.
translation.es: Pasillo seis, algo ha destellado ante la cámara.

translation.en: Frank, East Wing. Don, take the West. I'll take the stairs.
translation.es: Frank, ala este. Don, oeste. Yo las escaleras.

translation.en: Here, take my car.
Go. Go.
Go on.
What do you want from me?!
Okay. Now what?
Doug?
No. No, Miranda, no.
Miranda, don't! No, don't, please!
Please! No! Miranda, no! No, please!
Please! Don't do this to me! No!
Don't! No! Miranda, no, wait! Don't do this to me, please, Miranda!
Miranda, no! Don't! No!
Don't do this to me, Miranda! Miranda, please!
I love you.
What did I do?
Why?
Why?
Why me?
Why? Why?
Willow Creek.
How was Willow Creek?
This rain is slowing the work down. It's a big damn mess.
translation.es: Esta lluvia está retrasando el trabajo.

translation.en: I'll see you in a couple of days.
translation.es: Te veré dentro de un par de días.

translation.en: It's good to be God.
I love you.
-Drop the knife! -Drop the gun!
Put it on the ground now!
-Drop the gun! -Drop the knife!
-You drop it! -Holy Christ.
What?
Help me, please!
Help!
Carter, get down here now!
Help me, please!
Please!
All I can tell you is that the girl has been identified as Tracy Seavers.
translation.es: Solo puedo decirles que la joven se llama Tracy Seavers.

translation.en: She was reported missing two weeks ago.
She was found this morning by two patrolmen in Willow Creek...
translation.es: Esta mañana la han encontrado viva en Willow Creek...

translation.en: ...at a farm belonging to Dr. Douglas Grey. She is now hospitalized.
translation.es: ...en una granja del doctor Grey. Está hospitalizada.

translation.en: Can she speak? Has she told you anything?
-We can't comment on that. -Are there others?
We can't confirm that. Excuse me.
Sheriff, is the FBI taking over this investigation?
Why don't you ask the goddamn FBI?
We need her at the hospital for medication.
Consider house arrest pending trial, given the circumstances.
translation.es: Acepte el arresto domiciliario en espera de juicio.

translation.en: Last night, your client dropped a guard...
translation.es: Ayer su cliente tumbó a un guardia...

translation.en: ...assaulted a nurse, escaped from an institution, stole a car--
translation.es: ...atacó a una enfermera, huyó de un psiquiátrico, robó un coche...

translation.en: And saved a girl's life.
-How did she know she was there? -I don't know.
translation.es: ¿Cómo sabía que la chica estaba allí? Ni idea...

translation.en: -But the point is-- -The woman is still a murder suspect!
translation.es: - ...pero el caso es... - ¡Que aún es sospechosa!

translation.en: Come here.
The FBI says there could be more victims.
translation.es: El FBI dice que podría haber más víctimas.

translation.en: There were needles down there, a video camera.
Once the press gets ahold of it, it'll get big and ugly.
translation.es: Si llega a la prensa, la cosa se pondrá fea.

translation.en: Now, I need some answers, and I'm running out of time.
translation.es: Necesito respuestas y se agota el tiempo.

translation.en: So your client isn't going anywhere until my team....
translation.es: Su cliente no irá a ninguna parte...

translation.en: I need to talk to her.
It's hard to believe Doug did something like this.
translation.es: Cuesta creer que Doug hiciera una cosa así.

translation.en: We worked together a long time. I thought I knew him pretty well.
How could I be so blind?
Well, you weren't the only one, Phil.
translation.es: Tú no has sido el único, Phil.

translation.en: Do you think my daughter could also have been a victim of Doug's?
translation.es: ¿Crees que mi hija también pudo ser víctima de Doug?

translation.en: Yes.
That's what "not alone" means.
translation.es: Eso es lo que significa No sola.

translation.en: Rachel was trying to tell me that she was not Doug's only victim.
translation.es: Rachel intentaba decirme que ella no era la única víctima de Doug.

translation.en: And all this time...
...we thought our baby had committed suicide.
translation.es: ...creímos que nuestra pequeña se había suicidado.

translation.en: You see...
...even after she was gone....
What?
I had this recurring dream about her.
translation.es: Soñaba con ella, el mismo sueño.

translation.en: Eventually I took medication to block it out.
What kind of dream?
She was burning in flames, in terrible pain.
translation.es: Que ella ardía en llamas, sufriendo terriblemente.

translation.en: I couldn't save her.
I saw her exactly the same way, burning in flames.
translation.es: Yo la vi exactamente así, ardiendo en llamas.

translation.en: What does that mean?
I wouldn't look for a real-world explanation.
It's a dream, a delusion.
A delusion that we both seem to share.
translation.es: Un delirio que al parecer compartimos.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Pete. I was just talking to Parsons.
translation.es: Pete, he estado hablando con Parsons.

translation.en: I've been wrong about everything until now.
It's finally clear to me. The image is finally clear.
translation.es: Por fin está claro. La imagen está clara.

translation.en: The man raping women in prison is connected to the murders.
translation.es: Hay conexión entre el violador, los asesinatos...

translation.en: It goes back to the Anima Sola tattoo.
Miranda, you have to stop doing this. Do you understand me?
translation.es: Tienes que dejar de hacer esto. ¿Entiendes?

translation.en: Every time people start taking you seriously, you talk about delusions.
translation.es: Cuando empiezan a tomarte en serio, tú insistes en esos delirios.

translation.en: I'm not deluded, Pete, I'm possessed.
I don't believe in ghosts.
translation.es: Yo no creo en los fantasmas.

translation.en: Neither do I, but they believe in me.
translation.es: Yo tampoco. Ellos creen en mí.

translation.en: Great, just great.
Let's go. Come on.
I need to talk to Sheriff Ryan.
translation.es: He de hablar con el sheriff.

translation.en: He's working with the FBI team. He won't be back tonight.
translation.es: Se ha ido con el FBI. Hoy ya no volverá.

translation.en: It's really important.
I'll leave him a message.
Thank you.
Screw it.
I got a message you wanted to talk to me?
translation.es: Me han dicho que querías verme.

translation.en: I wanna talk to you. Maybe this time you can actually hear me.
translation.es: Quiero hablar. Quizá esta vez puedas escucharme...

translation.en: The last time, all you wanted to do was scream and yell and accuse me--
translation.es: ...porque la última vez solo querías gritar y acusarme.

translation.en: -Is this what you wanna talk about? -No. I wanna talk about the facts.
translation.es: - ¿Quieres hablar de eso? - Quiero hablar de los hechos.

translation.en: They're a little different now, right?
Do you know what happens to a small-town sheriff...
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué le pasa a un sheriff...

translation.en: ...when the FBI takes over?
-If you know anything, anything-- -Not alone.
translation.es: - Si sabes algo... - Es No solo.

translation.en: What?
Not alone.
I know what it means.
There are two killers.
Parsons and I both saw a girl burning in flames.
translation.es: Parsons y yo vimos a una chica en llamas.

translation.en: Then I saw Chloe being raped by a man with an Anima Sola tattoo on his body.
translation.es: Yo vi a Chloe violada por un hombre con un tatuaje del Ánima Sola...

translation.en: A woman burning in flames. Get it?
Okay, it's crazy. I know it sounds crazy. Pete has told me it's crazy.
translation.es: Es de locos. Parece de locos. Eso me ha dicho Pete.

translation.en: -You told Pete? When? -Yes.
This afternoon. Why?
I don't think you're crazy at all. I don't know why he would dismiss it.
translation.es: Yo no te considero loca. Y no sé por qué Pete iba a descartarlo.

translation.en: -You actually saw this tattoo? -Yes, I saw it. On a man.
translation.es: - ¿Realmente viste ese tatuaje? - Lo vi. En un hombre.

translation.en: I've heard of serial killers who hunt together.
translation.es: Existen dúos de asesinos en serie.

translation.en: Classic mentor and disciple syndrome.
So we're looking for the disciple? Who could it be?
-I don't know. -You're a psychiatrist.
translation.es: - No lo sé. - Tú eres psiquiatra.

translation.en: What kind of guy would this have to be?
He would have to be someone who grew up in a household...
translation.es: Tendría que ser alguien que se crio en un hogar...

translation.en: ...that had an absent father.
He developed...
...an obsessive, over-dependent relationship with his mother...
translation.es: ...una relación obsesiva y de dependencia hacia su madre...

translation.en: ...which then turned into some inappropriate sexual attraction.
translation.es: ...que se convirtió en una atracción sexual inadecuada.

translation.en: He probably even got off torturing little animals as a kid.
translation.es: Puede que de niño se excitara torturando pequeños animales.

translation.en: And as a man he is totally confused about his sexuality.
translation.es: Y de adulto, está completamente... ...confuso respecto a su sexualidad.

translation.en: That's who he is.
Man, that's screwed up.
But a guy like that could seem smart and normal, right?
translation.es: ¿Pero ese hombre podría parecer lúcido y normal?

translation.en: Yeah, they usually do. Yeah.
Look, Miranda, I don't wanna scare you...
...but if there is a second killer out there...
translation.es: ...pero si hay un segundo asesino suelto...

translation.en: ...he is frantically trying to cover his trail.
translation.es: ...ahora estará desesperado por borrar su rastro.

translation.en: You're a big threat to this guy. Who knows how much more you know?
translation.es: Y tú eres una amenaza, pues a saber qué más sabes.

translation.en: I don't know anything else.
You saw the tattoo, found the girl at the barn.
translation.es: Viste el tatuaje, diste con la chica.

translation.en: Yeah, but I found all that by instinct.
translation.es: Di con ello por puro instinto.

translation.en: This guy is facing the electric chair.
translation.es: Él se enfrenta a la silla eléctrica.

translation.en: He doesn't have the luxury of believing in instinct or ghosts.
translation.es: No puede creer en el instinto ni en fantasmas.

translation.en: He's gotta believe that Doug confessed to you what he was doing.
translation.es: Tiene que creer que Doug te confesó lo que hacía.

translation.en: But he didn't confess.
Maybe he didn't spill it out loud, but....
translation.es: Quizá no lo hiciera en voz alta, pero...

translation.en: Well, you know, you're a psychiatrist.
There's a lot of ways to confess.
I'm just trying to put myself in this guy's place.
translation.es: Solo intento ponerme en el lugar de ese tío.

translation.en: Then why didn't he go back to Willow Creek?
translation.es: ¿Y por qué no volvió a Willow Creek?

translation.en: -Take care of the girl, clean up? -Yeah.
Well, that's how you get caught. You panic.
translation.es: Así es como te pillan. Te entra el pánico.

translation.en: Better to let the dust settle.
translation.es: Hay que dejar que pase la tormenta.

translation.en: But about you...
-...he's desperate. -Yeah?
Desperate enough to...
...talk to me?
Well, you're right.
I do fit the profile.
Long-time friend of Doug's, access to the prison.
translation.es: Viejo amigo de Doug. Acceso a la cárcel.

translation.en: I never did get a kick out of torturing animals, though.
translation.es: Aunque nunca me excitó torturar animales.

translation.en: Stop it!
-You can't kill me! -I'm not gonna kill you.
translation.es: - ¡No puedes matarme! - No voy a matarte.

translation.en: After this kicks in... I'm gonna have a lot more fun with you than Doug ever did.
translation.es: Cuando esto haga efecto, disfrutaré contigo más de lo que disfrutó Doug.

translation.en: Help!
Help me! Help!
Help me!
You tried to escape, Miranda.
That means I can do whatever I want to you.
translation.es: Eso significa que puedo hacerte todo lo que quiera.

translation.en: Rachel wasn't the first, you know.
Doug killed a girl when he was 15 years old!
translation.es: ¡Doug mató a una chica cuando tenía quince años!

translation.en: I helped him bury the body.
What are best friends for?
We got older. But I gotta tell you...
...you never lose your taste for the young girls.
translation.es: ...nunca pierdes el gusto por las jovencitas.

translation.en: Then we stopped for a long time.
But then Dougie saw sweet Rachel and....
translation.es: Pero entonces Dougie vio a la dulce Rachel.

translation.en: That was an itch way too deep not to scratch.
And then we had the time of our lives out at Willow Creek.
translation.es: Y luego lo pasamos genial en Willow Creek.

translation.en: Everything was perfect.
Those girls would do anything.
translation.es: Esas chicas hacían lo que fuera.

translation.en: We were their god.
Until you--
You and I both know you're not getting out of here.
translation.es: Ambos sabemos que no saldrás de aquí.

translation.en: So let's be logical...
...and end this thing.
Thank you, Miranda.
Rachel?
This isn't logical.
You're already dead!
Logic is overrated.
I'm sorry, Miranda.
So it's been almost a year and I still have bad dreams.
translation.es: Ya ha pasado casi un año y aún tengo pesadillas.

translation.en: Sometimes I wake up screaming.
That's normal.
No, not these dreams.
Everyone thought you and I were crazy...
translation.es: Todo el mundo creía que estábamos locas...

translation.en: ...but we were seeing the truth.
More than they could see.
translation.es: Más de lo que podían ver ellos.

translation.en: Once you open the door, you can never close it.
translation.es: Una vez abres la puerta, ya no puedes cerrarla.

translation.en: Not true. I closed it.
translation.es: No es cierto. Yo la he cerrado.

translation.en: Then I locked it...
...and then I threw away the key.
I really hope that's true.
You know, my train leaves in half an hour.
translation.es: Mi tren sale dentro de media hora.

translation.en: Okay. I'll get you on your way.
So good luck with your job, okay?
I wanted to thank you for what you did.
translation.es: Quería darte las gracias por lo que hiciste.

translation.en: You really helped me.
You helped me.
You taught me how to listen.
Thank you.
We made it.
